page.title: 20A THOUGHT FROM PLYMTREE
page.content: "THE SPONSOR" It would be nice if we could be A village set beside the sea "A good idea" the host replied I'm sure we could be if we tried. Now sponsoring's the thing to do You sponsor me, I'll sponsor you And get your friends from far and wide All open pursed and starry eyed. We'll start the dig at Hare and Hounds You dig from home, I'm Sidmouth bound Soon all the world will speak Of Pretty Plymtree on the creek. And then the visitors will come Leaving litter by the ton And where the bus shelter once stood They'll be selling hot dogs and fancy goods. And could life ever be the same With go-carting down Greenend Do you think it might be best If we voted for a sponsored rest?
